programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.title: Lingo UK S1
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Monster Jam S3
programme.desc: Returning season. Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S8
programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. Featuring videos of the most extreme and destructive weather conditions, firsthand accounts, and professional meteorologists sharing tales from the front lines, viewers get to experience the fury of Mother Nature.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C S2
programme.desc: It's Sports Day on CLUB M.A.G.I.C! Miss P is conducting a friendly race among her Positive Agents! Sham makes Miss P proud when he readily congratulates Didi for winning the race. Miss P says he has great sportsmanship! THE BIG WORD is 'marathon' and the smaller words featured are ran, hot and moth. In ROCKIN' RHYTHM, Didi does a sporty aerobicize that gets everyone moving their bodies.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S4
programme.desc: Shelly has trouble with her 10 musical pipes. The Number Squad needs to determine the operational pipes and those requiring fixing. Can they solve the musical mystery and restore harmony? Number squad helps Captain Red to locate the Golden Fluffwort. The squad faces the challenge of deciphering the numerical clues on a mysterious paper to locate the elusive plant.

programme.title: Cows & Crayons S1
programme.desc: Cows & Crayons S1.

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus 7
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus 7
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Mike is showered with attention as the ambassador of the popular Pim & Pop juice drink - the Mega Mangosteen Mix! However, he soon discovers that the school's favorite drink harbours a delicious, dark secret.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Following the Pim & Pop debacle, the Puberteens have become the public enemy. Celeste takes it upon herself to single-handedly rehiblitate the Puberteens' image, and encounters a nemesis of old.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark S3
programme.desc: After the end of the Transformers' war, the Malto family moves to Witwicky, Pennsylvania, to start a new life but their lives soon get entangled with a group of Terran Transformers.

programme.title: Totally Spies S7
programme.desc: Season 7 takes the Spies on their biggest adventure yet, relocating from Beverly Hills to Singapore, experience a new culture and taking on a fresh crop of bizarre villains!

programme.title: Ultraman Omega
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) There are many universes, they may be similar, but they have their own characteristics, as in the case of Omegaverse. A universe that's similar to the original Ultra universe, but has its own ultras. Omega is a Space Garrison rookie who was sent to Earth on a mission to protect it from monsters that appear mysteriously.

programme.title: P. King Duckling
programme.desc: P. King Duckling is an animated comedy series that follows the adventures of a friendly but slightly hapless duck P. King and his two best friends, Wombat and Chumpkins, as they find hilarious and creative ways to overcome challenges.

programme.title: P. King Duckling
programme.desc: P. King Duckling is an animated comedy series that follows the adventures of a friendly but slightly hapless duck P. King and his two best friends, Wombat and Chumpkins, as they find hilarious and creative ways to overcome challenges.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A young silver dragon teams up with a mountain spirit and an orphaned boy on a journey through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S3
programme.desc: Twelve teams from top hotels, restaurants and small businesses compete to be crowned best patisserie team in Britain. Once again, judges Cherish Finden and Benoit Blin set exceedingly tricky challenges, to test the teams' creativity and precision. From towering, skyline-inspired chocolate constructions, to geometric tarts with moving parts, these incredible creations showcase bakers at the peak of their profession.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft disappeared.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2025
programme.desc: Traffic and Drug Offences: A high-speed chase leads to a joint SPF and CNB operation, exposing a web of drug offences. Watch how the Traffic Police work with the CNB to bring the offenders to justice.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Spy In The Ocean
programme.desc: The spy creatures are taking on their most exciting challenge yet, exploring the ocean, one of the most magical and dynamic environments on Earth. A brand-new cast of camera-toting spy creatures take us places no spy camera has ever gone before - from the colour and beauty of coral reefs to the extremes of rocky coasts.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S3
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: Survivor 47
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Supa Strikas

programme.title: Galapagos X
programme.desc: Four kids from the future, which is a troubled one, come to the present to help us prevent climate change problems. No more strawberry Jam? What will I put on my toast! Our team Orchid, Zephyr, Rae and Oshie are dispatched to unravel the mystery that is Dr. Crock, our super-rich social media entrepreneur/philanthropist kidnapping all the bees so she can monoplize honey products - candles, shampoo and cereal - forever.

programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: Sloppy and the Triangle Aliens are tasked with cleaning up - their least favorite chore. To help them take care of the clutter in their living room, they create the ultimate vacuum which ends up sucking everything in the house, including themselves, into an alternate realm. Together, they have to find their way out so they can get back to Mr Triangle Man's party. It's Ollipolis's founding anniversary and the townspeople are celebrating by putting up a grand ballet.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Young Geo explores Tangra-planet, an amazing place with geometrical landscapes, along with his friends the Tangranimals . These amusing creatures can link together like Tangram pieces, and thus create all sorts of vehicles, creatures and objects. With that power, plus a good measure of imagination, Geo and his friends are ready to meet any challenge!

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S29
programme.desc: When an army of powerful alien beings are unleashed on Earth, threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the pre-historic power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

programme.title: PJ Masks S4
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: Baron, once a regional manager abroad, returned home during COVID and now sells fish. Cordillia, a Dean's List grad, left venture capital after six months for the workshop, fixing cars instead.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: In part two, Steven Chia goes behind Singapore road races - probing safety prep, rising fees, and medics' response - then runs his first half marathon to test first-aid coverage.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2025
programme.desc: Traffic and Drug Offences: A high-speed chase leads to a joint SPF and CNB operation, exposing a web of drug offences. Watch how the Traffic Police work with the CNB to bring the offenders to justice.

programme.title: MasterChef Junior: Home For The Holidays
programme.desc: Nine junior contestants cook up culinary masterpieces to celebrate all holidays including Christmas, Lunar New Year, Kwanzaa, Hannukah and more. The winner will takes home a $25,000 grand prize and a Viking Kitchen package. And this holiday season, each junior chef will leave with a kitchen-related prize, including a Viking Kitchen package for the runner-up.

programme.title: Mark Moriarty – Cook Like A Chef - Series 1
programme.desc: In Cook Like a Chef, award-winning chef Mark Moriarty invites viewers to rethink the way they cook at home. Forget the notion that great food demands endless ingredients or hours in the kitchen. With a handful of core ingredients, a well-stocked pantry, and a few pro tips, Mark shows how anyone can create restaurant-worthy meals in their own kitchen.

programme.title: Celebrity Lingo S1
programme.desc: Celebrity Lingo is a spin-off from the fast-paced daytime word game Lingo. Celebrity Lingo is hosted by RuPaul Charles, Famous twosomes will work against the clock as they try to figure out where the letters go in a series of words... but it's not as easy as it might sound. The celebs will also be hoping to guess enough words correctly in order to win money for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Sitting on a Fortune S2
programme.desc: Players can win up-to 100,000 in prize money in this high-stakes, high-tension game show hosted by Gary Lineker. But with no lifelines or chances to walk away they will risk everything on getting the right answer.

programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Amber, enraged that Edward is undermining her career, walks into his trap. Irfan helps the police nab Usman and confesses his own wrongdoing to them.

programme.title: A Taste of Australia in Vietnam
programme.desc: Host Luke Nguyen travels through Vietnam meeting with inspiring Australians who represent the spirit of the Australia-Vietnam relationship while cooking with Australian produce and enjoying Vietnamese regional dishes.

programme.title: Elsbeth S1
programme.desc: Astute but unconventional attorney Elsbeth Tascioni utilizes her singular point of view to make unique observations and corner brilliant criminals alongside the NYPD.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing - Series 3
programme.desc: Maggie, Sully, Sydney, Rob, Frank, and Edna head out to help Cal and the Search and Rescue team search the woods for missing Lola and Jacob. Maggie is asked to consult on a medical case where a patient is displaying neurological symptoms, only to be shocked when she learns the patient's identity.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: A lightning strike during a stormy night causes Sloppy's robot, Mr Ticklehands to come alive and begin imitating Sloppy's every move. But when Sloppy gets annoyed and shows the robot the door, Mr Ticklehands goes on a journey to fulfil a new dream. The Imp has lost his memory and the gang take him in until he recovers. As they do, they realize that he's not such a bad guy after all. But can the Imp really be trusted?

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Young Geo explores Tangra-planet, an amazing place with geometrical landscapes, along with his friends the Tangranimals . These amusing creatures can link together like Tangram pieces, and thus create all sorts of vehicles, creatures and objects. With that power, plus a good measure of imagination, Geo and his friends are ready to meet any challenge!

programme.title: 分家解密
programme.desc: 1965年8月9日，李光耀总理在电视戏剧性的落泪画面，成了大家的集体回忆。殊不知，更令人震撼的桥段其实藏在解密档案和私人书信里。新马分家刚尘埃落定，警方竟揭发暗杀李先生的阴谋，外交官则担心马方或“军事占领”新加坡，而英国人为新加坡基地的未来苦恼 — 秘密存放的核武怎么办？高风险的外交斡旋、人性的脆弱，一切尽在节目下集。.

programme.title: 前线追踪
programme.desc: 第33届东南亚运动会将在下个月9日登场，我国运动员整装待发，力争荣耀。《前线》走到幕后，探访往来新马两地备战的脚踏车选手，同时跟随国家冰球队的三兄妹，记录他们追逐运动梦想的脚步。 随着2025年步入尾声，我们邀请读者选出他们心目中最能代表2025年的字，以及分享他们对新一年的期许和希望。.

programme.title: 最火搭档2
programme.desc: 正仪和阿妮对宏博两兄妹遭到继父的虐待深感同情。宏博透露他和妹妹乐琳两人前世是绑匪，曾经绑架过大小眼和他们的母亲，所以这辈子才会投胎到这里受折磨还债。正仪听了，怀疑宏博有妄想症。.

programme.title: 最火搭档2
programme.desc: 小曼等人在火化场找到欣怡的尸体，断定绑架案与在火化场工作的竹竿有关。正仪暗中跟踪大小眼，以便找出竹竿的下落，不料竹竿突然被杀，而报警的人竟是大小眼，令案情更加扑朔迷离。.

programme.title: 行医
programme.desc: 德伟发现敏妃在服用国恩的中药，嫉妒得大发雷霆。敏妃把这事告知国恩，国恩认为德伟对自己有成见，敏妃觉得国恩太敏感。德伟希望敏妃可以同到德国治疗，敏妃表示不想离开父亲，其实她真正在乎的人是国恩，令德伟更痛恨国恩。.

programme.title: 行医
programme.desc: 建中车祸身亡，思云怀疑建中的意外是德伟造成。芝仪提醒思云这只是她自己的猜测，没有真凭实据，不能乱说话。芝仪还说这个世界没有永远的秘密，如果德伟真的做了亏心事，一定会被揭发。.

programme.title: 有何贵食
programme.desc: 民以食为天，人人都爱吃，不管是什么人。吃得好，吃得精已不稀奇，很多人更趋向于吃得奢华，吃得贵，吃得稀有。世界上有些食物或食材以价格昂贵出名。究竟它们有多贵？为何会卖得如此高价？是因为物以稀为贵？还是物以贵为稀？是为了搞噱头？还是背后有什么不为人知的苦衷？那它们的味道有什么特别？它们的烹调法又有何与众不同？想要品尝，得去哪里找？.

programme.title: 香港系列之原味道
programme.desc: 香港人北上吃喝的热潮持续，久而久之或忽略了同样具有特色的本土味道。近年不少本地老字号、食肆、食品厂因不同原因结业，市民实应珍惜现时仍留下来、一直坚持「香港制造」的有心人。五位主持黄剑文、冼靖峰、潘静文、庄子璇、王汛文引领观众走进农田、鱼排，见识香港农业、渔业的发展。节目也会从土炮食材出发，寻找真正来自本港或香港制造的优质食材，借以支持一班坚守原味道的业界朋友，协助振兴本土经济。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮
programme.desc: 云林看到 street netball 的比赛海报，决定找安琪和贝贝一起组队，贝贝不敢拒绝。为了接近冰冷的韩槟，安琪想尽法子逼韩槟报恩。云风再次将贝贝救出困境，他还点醒贝贝应该多表达内心感受。安琪尝试对 Arina 表现出同情，却遭她嫌弃。Arina 与同在悲伤的母亲发生摩擦，两人试着一起振作。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻

programme.title: 中东密探
programme.desc: 中东密探将带领观众深入了解沙乌地阿拉伯的生活与文化，用最贴近当地人的方式，从西岸到东岸揭开沙乌地阿拉伯的神秘面纱。从台北飞往沙乌地阿拉伯最西边的城市吉达，沿着滨海大道一路向南，经过代表阿拉伯文化的各式圆环，并抵达象征打开观光大门的滨水休息区和彩色行人徒步区。在参观完沙乌地阿拉伯唯一开放给大众的水族馆后，前往吉达最大的鱼市场，体验当地人的热情、品尝红海海鲜料理。.

programme.title: 天行健
programme.desc: 晚清末年，社会动荡，净坛密藏宝图失窃，各方势力争夺。曾为御前侍卫的门三刀受命追回宝图，揭露幕后黑手。天津大沽县发生命案，九名死者由融天岭门人所杀，县衙捕快王地保独自追查凶手。与此同时，融天岭掌门卓不凡与淇亲王密谋联手夺宝，图谋利用宝藏来实现各自目的。三人不约而同前往上海，却无意间卷入一场波澜壮阔的历史风波。.

programme.title: 斗罗大陆之燃魂战
programme.desc: 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛后，唐三与小伙伴们依依惜别，他们约定五年后再聚首，随即分头踏上各自的人生道路。武魂殿比比东暗中布局，横扫几大宗门，妄图称霸斗罗大陆。于是唐三集结伙伴们创立唐门，秉持对正义的追求，坚定扛起重任。他们合力勇闯海神岛，对抗武魂殿，不畏黑暗势力和强权，携手维护全大陆和平，匡扶正义，共同成长为不屈不挠的战士。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 宝珠不舒服，秋桦陪她去看医生，忘记了答应佳珍煮饭的事。宝珠因为佳珍失职而大发脾气，佳珍以为秋桦故意摆她一道，心里有气，向秋桦发飙，后来知道秋桦因为陪宝珠去看医生才没有煮饭，向她道歉，两人冰释前嫌。.

programme.title: 饮茶
programme.desc: 煎炸点心香脆可口，也是吸引「较年轻一辈」的饮茶食品选择！盈盈为家英哥点齐「四大炸点」春卷、芋角、咸水角、炸云吞，各有特色。而把炸云吞提升至更高层次的「锦卤云吞」，又有什么故事？有新派餐厅亦为咸水角与芋角加添矜贵度，咸水角造成雪梨形状，咬下去竟有烟熏感觉？昔日的点心车年代，有专为煎糕而设计的车款；此外，黄金糕的起源如何？枫馨另介绍一款「上汤煎粉果」，要做到外皮松脆、馅料烟韧兼备，绝不容易！.

programme.title: 星期二特写：少年Z的烦恼
programme.desc: 他们被霸凌、自残、焦虑、沉迷网络和电玩，自我封闭与世隔绝，甚至因忧郁而走到轻生边缘。研究显示，每三名青年就有一人曾陷入悲伤与孤独。全新五集纪录片《少年Z的烦恼》直击当下青年的心灵挣扎，透过访问与搬演重现，聆听他们真诚的告白，并探索家庭、学校与社会可以如何搭建桥梁，陪伴他们走出成长期的黑暗。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮

programme.desc: 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛后，唐三与小伙伴们依依惜别，他们约定五年后再聚首，随即分头踏上各自的人生道路。武魂殿比比东暗中布局，横扫几大宗门，妄图称霸斗罗大陆。于是唐三集结伙伴们创立唐门，秉持对正义的追求，坚定扛起重任。他们合力勇闯海神岛，对抗武魂殿，不畏黑暗势力和强权，携手维护全大陆和平，匡扶正义，共同成长为不屈不挠的战士。.

programme.title: 开档咯! 夜市星手
programme.desc: 一组结婚多年，默契十足。一组新婚燕尔，如漆似胶！林明伦与陈毓芸，徐鸣杰和陈凤玲，两组明星夫妻档，在比赛的压力下如何发挥创意呈献甜蜜蜜的料理？.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 宝珠当众质问佳珍有关支票的事，佳珍坦言那是王度退还给建海的聘金。宝珠责骂建海竟然瞒着自己私下给了聘金，佳珍意外宝珠原来并不知情。宝珠责佳珍一家贪得无厌，指出杰奇给的支票故意写错日期，根本过不到账，佳珍感震惊。.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 为了帮杰奇筹钱，梁欣向秋桦借钱，秋桦要梁欣帮忙找出佳珍和子俊的合照，就会把钱借给她。梁欣虽找出佳珍和子俊的照片，但最终决定不把照片给秋桦，而是伪造了一封佳珍写给子俊的情书给秋桦，秋桦把钱借给梁欣。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 小当家

programme.title: 但愿人长久

programme.title: 开着餐车趴趴走 2
programme.desc: 餐车之旅过半，三位主持人前往登嘉楼甘马挽，参与河龟保育活动、品尝鱼面，体验捕捞小鱼与制作江鱼仔的乐趣。随后，他们抵达全马最大的海南村，了解当地历史，学习制作美味的海南糕饼，并以海南牛肉粉与热情的在地人畅谈交流。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮
programme.desc: 美人发现自己一番苦心被云风浪费，偷偷恶整他来泄愤。贝贝向钟博士寻求感情忠告，反令钟博士忆起自己的初恋情人。云林找来 Arina 帮忙教队友们投篮。Nurin 欲把丈夫以前的小吃摊重新租下，但问题多多。大田被之前赏识自己的导演特邀，参加电影试镜。大田喜不自胜，认为他当电影男主角的梦想终于可以实现了。.

programme.title: 他乡的煮人
programme.desc: 《他乡的煮人》将通过发掘各人的奋斗经历、美食背后的故事，以及烹调上精益求精的匠人精神，加深观众对香港美食的认知。不同年代皆有香港厨师，凭借自身实力，于世界各地一展所长，落地生根。节目将展现他们如何坚持香港饮食文化的“传承、创新、融合”三大原则，将独一无二的香港美食，立足他乡，成就一个个动人的香港煮人故事。.

programme.title: 战地食谱
programme.desc: 朝鲜战争爆发，韩国菜容易烹调、携带及易于饱腹的优点得以发挥。吃大麦拳头饭，韩国士兵能够活命。“将军汤饭”据说在当时为将军赢得重要战役！美军催生部队锅；平壤冷面和米肠，是南边朝鲜人的乡味。.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 梁欣从德明的相簿中，无意中发现父亲的相片，决定登报找人。建业发现梁欣竟然是自己同父异母的妹妹，担心宝珠受打击，谎称要帮梁欣登报寻人，但却将照片藏了起来。子俊禁锢佳珍，并与秋桦串谋，故意让建海知道佳珍和他在一起。.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 建海找子俊，叫他不要再和佳珍见面。子俊讥讽建海，说建海到现在和佳珍还没有夫妻之实，可见佳珍并不爱他。建海大受打击，失魂落魄之下被车撞倒。佳珍乘坐的巴士正好驶过车祸现场，却不知伤者是建海。.

programme.title: 养生出大招
programme.desc: 菊花明目人人懂，可是小巧的胎菊、苦涩的黄菊、清香的白菊，到底哪个才是明目大王？养生出大招，医师来拆招，菊花种类功效必须懂，这样才能选对菊花来明目，否则就是吃心酸！医师再破招，吃枸杞也有注意事项，小心体质不适合，吃了明目不成反而满眼血丝！ 喝奶茶可以养生吗？一位医师秘制明目奶茶，炒香一种神秘的中药材，用来泡水竟然散发淡淡咖啡香，还有清肝明目功效，绝对满足现代人时尚养生观！奇招还没完，练功师傅来一招左右引臂运火轮，保证练出火眼金睛！拉弓，引臂，按压膻中穴，转体，刺激手部经脉，手掌引领真气到眼睛，所有步骤一气呵成，双目跟着炯炯有神！ 最后，轮到厨师秀出煲汤绝招，把广东人的煲汤之宝明目鱼端上桌，煮出香甜美味的明目汤，喝了一起告别近视眼。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮
programme.desc: 云风陷入爱情迷思，为贝贝吃醋。美人刻意安排烛光晚餐，让云风和贝贝的关系微妙升温。Tracy 等为街头 netball 比赛紧锣密鼓特训，但大家都没信心，皆害怕被选上参赛。贝贝为了云林，决定克服恐惧，陪她们比赛。首战开打，众先拔头筹。没想次轮竟对上那组打败过他们两次的男女，云林和安琪更加斗志沸腾。.

programme.title: 长相思第二季
programme.desc: 玱玹挺过五叔和七叔的打压与暗算，成功接下西炎国的王位。小夭为了帮助玱玹的大业，打算倚仗中原氏族的团结助玱玹一臂之力，与赤水丰隆达成联姻的约定，而涂山璟以三十七年粮草收买防风邶在大婚典礼上当众抢婚，但防风邶也付出代价必须以死谢罪，从此相柳失去防风邶这个身份。尽管如此，青丘族长涂山璟与九头蛇妖相柳仍默默守护着小夭。.

programme.title: 斗罗大陆之燃魂战
programme.desc: 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛后，唐三与小伙伴们依依惜别，他们约定五年后再聚首，随即分头踏上各自的人生道路。武魂殿比比东暗中布局，横扫几大宗门，妄图称霸斗罗大陆。于是唐三集结伙伴们创立唐门，秉持对正义的追求，坚定扛起重任。他们合力勇闯海神岛，对抗武魂殿，不畏黑暗势力和强权，携手维护全大陆和平，匡扶正义，共同成长为不屈不挠的战士。.

programme.title: 非一般婚礼
programme.desc: 结婚对台湾原住民——排湾族来说，是一件神圣的事，牵涉个人阶级地位和家族名誉，讲求门当户对。这一次，Emily见证了一场贵族联姻，不仅见识到排湾族头目，婚礼的隆重和华丽，还体验了贵族婚礼独有的荡秋千仪式，化身最强亲友团，帮忙张罗聘礼、制作小米糕和花环。婚礼当天，宛如吵架的下聘礼和藏婚仪式更叫Emily惊心动魄，震撼不断。.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 宝珠因建海受伤而迁怒佳珍，佳珍录下与子俊的对话，播给宝珠听，证明自己是被冤枉的，但宝珠无法接受佳珍和建海只是挂名夫妻，赶她离开。建海左手伤势太重，可能无法恢复正常，宝珠伤心之下，要建业帮建海办分居手续。.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 厨师阿翔得知建海失踪之事，顿起歪念，于是谎称建海被绑架，分别勒索宝珠和佳珍。宝珠接到电话，急忙提了钱去交赎金，幸好遇到王度，他及时阻止，还设计拆穿阿翔所为，但佳珍不察，被阿翔骗走了两万。.

programme.title: 长相思第二季
programme.desc: 玱玹挺过五叔和七叔的打压与暗算，成功接下西炎国的王位。小夭为了帮助玱玹的大业，打算倚仗中原氏族的团结助玱玹一臂之力，与赤水丰隆达成联姻的约定，而涂山璟以三十七年粮草收买防风邶在大婚典礼上当众抢婚，但防风邶也付出代价必须以死谢罪，从此相柳失去防风邶这个身份。尽管如此，青丘族长涂山璟与九头蛇妖相柳仍默默守护着小夭。.

programme.title: 美味下半场

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇

programme.title: 怪宿宿

programme.title: 他乡的煮人
programme.desc: 《他乡的煮人》将通过发掘各人的奋斗经历、美食背后的故事，以及烹调上精益求精的匠人精神，加深观众对香港美食的认知。不同年代皆有香港厨师，凭借自身实力，于世界各地一展所长，落地生根。节目将展现他们如何坚持香港饮食文化的“传承、创新、融合”三大原则，将独一无二的香港美食，立足他乡，成就一个个动人的香港煮人故事。.

programme.title: 余生正好
programme.desc: 主持人楊佳賢邀請您一同坐在生命沙發上聆聽真實故事：從初老、慢老到餘生善好，如何老去，每個人都有自己的願景。正是生命的無常，讓我們有機會了解老病死苦的倫理。儘管我們很難給生命增加時間，卻可以給時間添加生命，活出如自己所願的餘生。願老去的日子裡，歲月無恙，餘生正好。.

programme.title: 浴水重生

programme.title: 浴水重生

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: 自70年代起，越南开始出现许多畸形婴儿，以及生来就患有重病的儿童。这些疾病似乎都来自同一个根源—“橙剂”。这是一种高效除草剂，在越战时，被美国军方大量喷洒在越南各地。如今，战争结束已将近50年，不过，这个毒性极强的化学品仍在影响着越南第三代、甚至第四代的孩童。.

programme.desc: 已有 50 多年的历史,在日本备受信赖和喜爱。运用磁力物理原理，不含药物成分，无需使用热敷、冷敷或药物，即可帮助缓解肌肉疼痛。磁力有助于促进健康的血液循环，进而有助于缓解肌肉僵硬。提供精准持久的缓解疼痛效果，每贴可使用长达 5 天。.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 一杯多用， 茶水分离, 设计典雅的茶漏咖啡杯让你方便携带！.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 富含高浓度PS与脑部所需重要营养，全面激活记忆力、专注力与思维清晰度。结合银杏叶、DHA与乙酰左旋肉碱，促进脑部循环、维持神经活力与专注表现, 适合18岁以上的学生、上班族或长者，每天一颗，为大脑充电.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: Philips Azur 8000系列蒸汽熨斗有OptimalTEMP免调校温控技术，保证不会把面料烫坏。智能温控保证不熨焦，让您水平、垂直熨烫一机搞定！.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 今天的办公室，不只是打工日，而是一场“椅子侦查”！泽亮化身CSI专家，检查Hazelle从颈项到腰椎的“犯罪现场” 一场笑料背后，其实藏着打工人久坐的真实痛点。跟着他们一起学几招，让坐班族也能轻松舒适过每一天！.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 当 Hazelle 走进空荡荡的办公室时，竟发现同事们全军覆没！快来看 Hazelle 如何用这台二合一加湿净化机，对抗干燥空气、细菌和闷热的办公室环境.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: NatureFarm's碧容健®，源自法国滨海松树皮萃取物，是一款高效天然抗氧化营养品。经过160项临床试验与450篇科学研究验证，全面帮助抵御氧化压力，守护大脑、眼睛、心脏、关节、肌肤及血糖健康，适合各年龄层日常保健。.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 仅重 4.5 公斤，轻巧便携，椅子、沙发或车里都能用，一靠即可全背按摩。双滚轮从颈肩到腰臀，舒缓肌肉、促进循环。靠垫柔软贴合、支撑力佳、透气舒适，随时轻松放松。.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: 这款La Gourmet 火焰电饭锅将火锅和烧烤炉结合一体。为您提供两全其美的享受。无论您是煮汤还是烧烤肉类和蔬菜，都能享受多功能的膳食准备！.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: HQ 灵芝破壁孢子粉由新加坡配制和生产。它能够增强身体的免疫系统，减少疲劳，促进血液循环，保护肝脏，并改善新陈代谢。.

programme.title: 大胃王来了- 东西军 （第四季）
programme.desc: 《大胃王来了!东西军》不只带你挖掘美食 更带你深入体验台湾各地风俗民情！.

programme.title: 幸福方程式
programme.desc: 日本虽然是个富裕的社会，但是正因为贫穷问题不明显，挨饿的人往往更容易被忽略和遗忘。大阪就曾发生母子困在家中活活饿死的事件。一些僧侣为此发起了一个救贫组织，将庙宇的供品转送给贫穷家庭作礼物，带给他们欢乐。僧侣和志工们奔波忙碌，一起尝到助人为快乐之本的味道，也体验了幸福的真谛。.

programme.title: 拜托了夏天
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 此剧讲述即使家庭成员之间有时会很讨厌大家，但最终会因为大家是一家人而重归于好的快乐、温馨家庭故事。.

programme.title: 皇家医生
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) 主要讲述了菜鸟学渣女医生，在电闪雷鸣的某一天意外穿越进古代王朝，并开启了自己在古代的医学生涯的故事，在此过程中，她结识了身为皇家医生的男主一家，在共同经历风雨后互生情愫却又不得不面临分开结局的故事.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 世娜和道贤成功成为了公司的新模特儿。 尹松终于找到了能证明自己在山庄火灾中清白的证据。.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 尹松在道贤的房间里发现了被藏起来的世娜血检报告，并决心查出他隐瞒的原因。.

programme.title: 智富食代
programme.desc: 台湾小吃汇纳百川、兼容多元的饮食底蕴，已扎进在地风土的滋味。小笼包、牛肉面、臭豆腐、烤黑轮等皆自成一格，打动无数中外饕客的心。各自带着历史、故事与情感，每款小吃带来以食之名所伴随的文化冲击、惊喜进而理解的过程，跨越语言隔阂，丰富了旅行的厚度与生命经验，至于踏上宝岛，有哪些绝对经典的小吃不能错过，智富特搜8种不能错过的经典庶民台湾味。.

programme.title: 玩家2
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 在得知崔总统的所作所为后，秀敏开始心生怀疑他是否与炯旻之死有关.

programme.title: 全民星攻略
programme.desc: 今天财富大楼将带您领略最前沿的运动时尚趋势，探索如何在保持健康的同时，展现个人风格与魅力——到店面购买适合的「跑鞋」，建议在「早上」还是「晚上」前往试穿？ 「超慢跑」不建议健康年轻人做的主因为「减脂效率」还是「运动强度」太低有关？ 脚踏车的坐垫高度应调至「腰部与臀部之间」还是「臀部下缘处」较恰当？.

programme.title: 17号音乐仓库 （第三季）
programme.desc: 主理人被告知需要解锁不同的“快乐任务”拿到“快乐密码”才能走出房门四位，他们能否顺利完成？第二次音乐试验如约而至，主理人需联合创作主题曲并争取解锁演出资源包。他们能否通关本次的音乐试验？本期节目的“来福外送”来自一位六岁的小朋友，与小朋友相处的过程也使主理人回忆起了自己童年的玩伴和简单的快乐。他们会展现怎样童心未泯的一面？从几位小朋友身上他们又会获得怎样的启发？仓库好友谭杰希、早安到达来福好室，由于无人在家而开启全自助式入住，他们与主理人会有怎样的爆笑互动？.

programme.title: 玩火之风
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) Phraphai 是一位熟练的心脏外科医生，她嫁给了电气工程师Din。两人有一个三岁的女儿。自从成为医生和母亲后，繁忙的工作及家庭生活，使Phraphai对爱情提不起兴致。在喝醉的状态下，Din滑倒并与Frame睡在一起。然而，对于Frame来说，这并不是一个错误。她想要更多，她想办法让Din与妻子断绝关系，但Phraphai很聪明。她找出了证据并向Din下了最后通牒，结果一场全面的爱情战争就此拉开序幕。.
